articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: Artemis 2 astronaut Jeremy Hansen says a Canadian will walk on the moon one day - Space.com
articles.description: 'American leadership makes space for a country like Canada to shine, and bring our genius.'
articles.content:
Canada's Artemis 2 astronaut says his country is just getting started in lunar realms with his round-the-moon mission.
Jeremy Hansen was named Canada's representative on Artemis 2 on April 3, and wi… [+5742 chars]
